reviews.review:
Even if you carry hard, you get reported and banned for playing with a toxic friend. Nice game. Love getting banned.

Update; Getting 12 day bans for playing well and even saying gg after the game. No toxicity on my part either.
Un juegasos aunque ahy flamers y eso pero dejando a lado todo eso muy buen juego
Cada dia que juego me dudo sobre mi existencia en este planeta, RECOMENDADISIMO!!!

I was hardcore cs player for many years but as I age the teenage bs is too much. i would recommend this game if you are a teenager or young adult. If your pushing 30 like me, try something else. The verbal vile these kids spew is too much. I want to have fun, not be berated by some kid who doesn't know anything about life. This is way too common in fps. Which is why i play coop mostly nowadays.
